changelog:
* Advances the Passphrase feature by showing the entered passphrase on the Trezor screen before opening the wallet.
* Adds support for Verge (XVG).
* Drops support for Metaverse (ETP), GINcoin (GIN), Pesetacoin (PTC), and Zel (ZEL).
* Introduces a hard limit on transaction fees to prevent accidentally paying extra hefty fees (the limit can be manually disabled).
* Resolves the problems with generating the Crown addresses.
* Re-enables spending altcoins from Bitcoin paths (fixing some compatibility issues with Bitcoin Cash wallets).
* Fixes smaller issues with the user interface, customization, and more.
